ticket.title: Mongel "--prefix" option breaks in 2.3.1
ticket.original-body:
Upgraded to latest 2.3 RC2 yesterday.
This works: mongrel_rails start
This doesn't: mongrel_rails start --prefix "/TRK"
In the latter case I get: C:/ruby/lib/ruby/gems/1.8/gems/activesupport-2.3.1/lib/active_support/d ependencies.rb:440:in `load_missing_constant': uninitialized constant ActionCont roller::AbstractRequest (NameError)
Please let me know, thank you.
